If you haven't already, you will need to: 如果您尚未準備好，您將需要從我們的網站下載 elementary OS。您可以依照下面的指示將下載來的 ISO 檔案複製到 USB 隨身碟中。
elementary OS is currently built for two: elementary OS 目前支援兩種處理器架構，32 位元和 64 位元。
If you know you have a newer computer wi: 如果您知道您擁有的是搭配 64 位元處理器之較新的電腦，選擇 64 位元版本。
If your computer is older or you do not: 如果您的電腦比較舊或者您不清楚您的電腦使用哪種處理器，選擇 32 位元版本。(64 位元的處理器在這個版本依然可以運作)
1 GHz 32-bit or 64-bit processor: 1 GHz 32 位元或 64 位元的處理器
Make sure to back your important data up: 請確認您已經備份您的重要資料到雲端服務或是外接硬碟的外部空間。安裝一套新的作業系統可能會複寫您現有的資料。
Choose your current Operating System: 選擇您目前所使用的作業系統
Select the operating system you are curr: 選擇您目前使用的作業系統來閱讀針對它所撰寫的安裝說明。
Verifying your download is an important,: Verifying your download is an important, but optional step. We generate a checksum (or hash sum) for elementary OS images and we recommend that you verify that your download matches that checksum before trying to install. This ensures that you've received the full, complete download and that your install image is not corrupted in any way.
Windows doesn't include a built-in tool: 微軟 Windows 作業系統沒有內建驗證 SHA256 檢查碼的驗證工具，所以我們需要去下載 Hash Tool.
Under &quot;Input File&quot; select <cod: 在 "Input File" 選項中選擇 Select File(s) 並且找到 elementary OS ISO 檔案。
Verify that the text in &quot;Results&qu: 在 "Results" 文字中驗證以下其中一個雜湊值（hashes）。
Rufus - select ISO: Rufus - 選取 ISO 檔案
Begin with a spare USB flash drive with: 準備一個額外的 USB 隨身碟，且至少擁有 1 GB 的可用空間。
You'll also need a small application cal: 您也會需要一個名爲 Rufus 的小程式。您必須從他的網站下載它然後開啓下載的檔案且執行它。它將會一個像下面所示的視窗：
You can now insert your USB drive and se: 您現在可以插入您的 USB 隨身碟，並在「裝置」清單中選取它。然後您要在「製作可開機磁碟使用...」中點擊選取「ISO 映像檔」選項。
to choose the ISO that you downloaded pr: 選擇您先前下載的 ISO 檔案。
Click &quot;Start&quot;, then just wait: 按下「開始」，接著等候處理程序完成。
In order to start the installation proce: 為了開始安裝過程，您必須利用安裝媒介開機。
Assuming that your computer is still on,: 如果您的電腦依然開著，請先插入您的安裝媒介然後重新啓動您的電腦。
Most computers will briefly allow you to: 多數的電腦會允許您按下特殊按鈕來改變這次開機順序 — 通常是 <kbd>F12</kbd>，不過有時是 <kbd>Esc</kbd> 或其他功能鍵。詳細請參考螢幕上的資訊或是您電腦的文件。
Press <kbd>F12</kbd> (or the appropriate: 按下 <kbd>F12</kbd> ( 或者適合的按鍵 ) 並選擇安裝裝置—通常是 "USB-HDD" 或者其他跟 "USB" 有關的選項，但或許會有點不同。如果您選擇了錯誤的裝置，您的電腦將會像平常一樣載入，只要重新啟動您的電腦，並試試清單中其他的裝置。
Shortly after selecting the appropriate: 當您選取了正確的引導驅動器后，您就會看到作業系統的背景圖。接下來，您只需按照熒幕上的指示和嚮導來進行餘下的安裝進程。
Running the following command in your te: 在您的終端機執行以下的指令:
Before creating an install drive, make s: Before creating an install drive, make sure you have all OS X updates installed. To check for available updates, open the Apple Menu and select either "Software Update…" or "App Store…" Make sure to install any OS updates in addition to ones labeled with "Firmware" and "Boot Camp".
You'll need a small application called &: You'll need a small application called "Create elementary Installer". Download the latest version from here, uncompress it, and open the app to launch it. If your Mac cannot open it because it's from an unidentifiable developer, right (or control) click the app, and click "Open".
Insert your spare USB drive, and in the: Insert your spare USB drive, and in the window below, select the ISO file you've just downloaded.
Next, select your USB drive to start the: Next, select your USB drive to start the installer creation process.
If your Mac doesn't recognize the result: If your Mac doesn't recognize the resulting drive in the boot menu, you may need to create an elementary OS Install DVD instead. To create one, insert a blank DVD, right click on the ISO file in Finder, and select "Burn elementaryos-freya-xx.xx.iso to Disc".
After you hear the chime, press and hold: 當您聽到啟動提示音后，按住<kbd>選項</kbd>，然後選擇相應的引導驅動器。要記住它有可能被錯誤地識別為“Windows”，此屬正常現象。
You'll also need a small application cal: You'll also need a small application called UNetbootin. To install it, just click this link.
Open UNetbootin from the Dash. It will o: Open UNetbootin from the Dash. It will open a window like the one below:
Make sure &quot;Diskimage&quot; is selec: 確定 "硬碟映像" 有勾選後，點擊 "..." 來選取您剛才下載的 ISO 映像檔。拔出其它沒有使用到的 USB 記憶體。點擊 "確認" 後等待程式完成。
Take this time to read the <a href=\"/do: Take this time to read the getting started guide to learn about your new operating system.
